column5: A good friend of mine is heading up to Eagle Lake next week and I was wondering how the fishing's been lately. Any help would be greatly appreciated. Looking for smallmouth & walleye action mostly.

My brother just returned from a week near Vermilion Bay, ON...said the Eagle Lake camps were sending their customers to other nearby lakes for Walleye. Seems strange as we have experienced an improvement on the lake where our cabin is..since 1959. The efforts over the last few years have paid off. Did they not make the same effort on Eagle?
